Same optimization can be done for findRichUsersWithAttributesByExactMatch() below.
Also I wonder, if we can optimize implementation of convertRichUsersToRichUsersWithAttributes() itself, which retrieves user by id. We can easily pass RichUser instead of User into getAttributes() method, but I'm not sure that some code doesn't rely on the exact class to be used.

replies.author: Vojtech-Sassmann

timeline.message:
Core - search users optimizations

* The most expensive operation when searching users as a Perun Admin was
checking, if the attribute definition passed to the authorization method
is correct. This doesn't need to be performed here, because this is
usually verified in earlier calls or to this method are passed only
definitions retrieved from the database.
* Also removed duplicit conversion of richUsers to
richUsersWithAttributes.
